MCSPI_FxnTable_s Struct Reference
SPI Driver » SPI Driver MCSPI API

The definition of a MCSPI function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific MCSPI driver implementation. More...

#include <MCSPI.h>

Data Fields

MCSPI_CloseFxn closeFxn

MCSPI_TransferCancelFxn transferCancelFxn
 

Detailed Description

The definition of a MCSPI function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific MCSPI driver implementation.

Field Documentation

MCSPI_CloseFxn MCSPI_FxnTable_s::closeFxn

Function to close the specified peripheral

MCSPI_ControlFxn MCSPI_FxnTable_s::controlFxn

Function to implementation specific control function

MCSPI_InitFxn MCSPI_FxnTable_s::mcspiInitFxn

Function to initialize the given data object

MCSPI_OpenFxn MCSPI_FxnTable_s::openFxn

Function to open the specified peripheral

MCSPI_TransferCancelFxn MCSPI_FxnTable_s::transferCancelFxn

Function to cancel MCSPI data transfer

MCSPI_TransferFxn MCSPI_FxnTable_s::transferFxn

Function to initiate a MCSPI data transfer
